content: For the quarter ended June 30th, we generated $0.73 of adjusted EPS on $5.8 million per day of adjusted net trading income, bringing our results for the first half of 2022 to $2 per share and an average adjusted net trading income of $7 million per day. We continue to see important success in our growth initiatives and on page five of the supplemental materials, you can see how these initiatives contributes meaningfully to our performance, again generating over $575,000 per day of ANTI, representing 10% of our adjusted net trading income in the quarter. Our Execution Services business also performed in line, with the market opportunity this quarter, realizing $104 million in adjusted net trading income. In the second quarter, as presented on slide three on our supplemental materials, our adjusted net trading income, which represents our trading gains, net of direct trading expenses totaled $357 million or $5.8 million per day, which is 6% higher than Q2 2021 and 29% lower than the first quarter. Market Making adjusted net trading income was $254 million or $4.1 million per day, 11% higher than a year ago quarter and 34% lower than the first quarter. Alex, please go ahead. Alex, please go ahead.
